item.title: Core: Overview
item.description: In this documentation we will describe what the App Admin is and what it does. Accesses An Access is a set of credentials and the authentication configuration that enables a Buyer to access a Supplier. To gain access, a Buyer needs to confirm with TravelgateX that they have an agreement in place with each Supplier with whom they want to integrate.
